cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 70 miles SSE of Charleston, South Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: tracking north-northeast parallel to the Southeast Atlantic coast, then forecast to accelerate northeastward toward the North Carolina coast and Atlantic Canada
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near or over the North Carolina coast (Cape Lookout/Cape Fear region)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch in effect from north of Chincoteague VA to Fenwick Island DE, Chesapeake Bay (Smith Point–Drum Point), Tidal Potomac south of Cobb Island, and portions of coastal Massachusetts.
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning from Savannah River GA to the NC/VA border including Pamlico and Albemarle Sounds; Tropical Storm Warning northward to Chincoteague VA and lower Chesapeake Bay.
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Atlantic coastline from coastal Georgia northward through the Carolinas and into the Mid-Atlantic.
weather_observation.wind: Only minimal gusty winds expected; cumulative probability of tropical-storm-force winds at the port is 3%.
weather_observation.rainfall: Isolated light showers possible, generally less than 1 inch.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Rip‐current risk remains elevated along Florida Atlantic beaches, but not at Port Manatee on the Gulf side.
